2117.note: One-line fix: vscode.Uri.parse('file:///'+path) -> vscode.Uri.file(path). CI pending.

2007_2013.note: Fix: splitSegmentsWithKnownLeaf uses DisplayName as hint to avoid splitting on . or + within test names.

1991.note: Fix: 60-second safety timeout on dotnet test --list-tests.

proposed_improvements.description: Fix VS Code engine version in release/package.json from ^0.10.0 to ^1.52.0
Filed issue #2132: Update @types/vscode from 1.52 to current
Fix Test Explorer hierarchy for test names containing . or + (affects #2007, #2013)
Fix: 60-second safety timeout to dotnet test --list-tests (affects #1991)

notes: Issue #2122: dotnet path wrong on Ubuntu - upstream FSAC issue
Issue #2125: region folding - FSAC folding provider doesn't support //#region markers
Issue #2116: parentheses highlight entire expression - commented pointing to FSAC UnnecessaryParentheses range fix needed upstream
Issue #2111: No test projects found error - commented with workaround (AutoDiscoverTestsOnLoad:false) and root cause (FSAC AdaptiveServerState.fs#L2715)
Issue #2123: operator tooltip not shown for operators starting with '.' - likely FSAC upstream issue
Issue #2126: xUnit test names garbled with float InlineData - Copilot PR #2127 exists (draft, stale since Feb 11)

Issue #2108: do! on partially applied function shows no error - upstream FCS/FSAC issue
Issue #2115: Cannot go to definition in .NET 10 Devcontainer - asked reporter to share their PR
Issue #1960: Test host crashes with duplicate test method names - labeled bug
Issue #2099: Bad indentation in list comprehension - labeled bug; directed to Fantomas
Issue #2086: MSBuild project graph MSB0001 error - suggested disabling FSharp.enableMSBuildProjectGraph
Issue #2046: Non-ASCII Windows username prevents Ionide from starting - suggested --extensions-dir workaround
Issue #2041: Go to test source not shown for C# test files - explained C# not supported
PR #2049: FSI ignore comments - waiting on author jkone27

Issue #2013: '.' in test names creates extra hierarchy nodes - FIX PR #2133 submitted
